# Armor and Shield Pricing by Bonus
## Overview
**Armor and Shield Pricing by Bonus**


| **ARMOR OR** |  |
|---|---|
| **SHIELD BONUS** | **BASE PRICE** |
| +1 | 1,000 gp |
| +2 | 4,000 gp |
| +3 | 9,000 gp |
| +4 | 16,000 gp |
| +5 | 25,000 gp |
| +6\* | 36,000 gp |
| +7\* | 49,000 gp |
| +8\* | 64,000 gp |
| +9\* | 81,000 gp |
| +10\* | 100,000 gp |

  \* An armor or shield canâ€™t have an enhancement bonus higher than +5. 

    Use these lines to determine price when special abilities that count as additional bonuses are added in.
